apps.name: BHTwitter 3.1 (Twitter_9.27_BHTwitter_3.1.ipa)
apps.versionDescription:
What's new with the 3.1 version:
- Fix Ads tweet issues
- Block Ads in the trending page

apps.name: BHTwitter 3.1 (Twitter_9.27_BHTwitter_3.1.TrollStore.ipa)
apps.versionDescription:
What's new with the 3.1 version:
- Fix Ads tweet issues
- Block Ads in the trending page

apps.name: BHTwitter 3.0 (Twitter_9.26_BHTwitter_3.0.ipa)
apps.versionDescription: What's new with the 3.0 version: - Add Hide Who to follow section - Add Hide Topics to follow section - Add Localization to the Tweak (Arabic, Japanese, Russian, Indonesian, zh-Hant) - Fix random crashes - Fix the location of Copy profile button when enabling Disable RTL option --- **[IPA version contains Open Twitter Safari extension](https://github.com/BandarHL/OpenTwitterSafariExtension)**

apps.name: BHTwitter 3.0 (Twitter_9.26_BHTwitter_3.0.TrollStore.ipa)
apps.versionDescription: What's new with the 3.0 version: - Add Hide Who to follow section - Add Hide Topics to follow section - Add Localization to the Tweak (Arabic, Japanese, Russian, Indonesian, zh-Hant) - Fix random crashes - Fix the location of Copy profile button when enabling Disable RTL option --- **[IPA version contains Open Twitter Safari extension](https://github.com/BandarHL/OpenTwitterSafariExtension)**

apps.name: BHTwitter 2.9.9 (Twitter_9.20_BHTwitter_2.9.9.ipa)
apps.versionDescription:
What's new with the 2.9.9 version:
- Add Status Tweet (vibe)
- Fix bugs and performance improvement

apps.name: BHTwitter 2.9.8 (Twitter_9.20_BHTwitter_2.9.8.ipa)
apps.versionDescription:
What's new with the 2.9.8 version:
- Always open in Safari is back!
- Add CoTweet
- Fix crash in Twitter settings
- Remove reply later (because Twitter delete it)
- Remove voice in reply (because it's useless)
- Add copy location
- Rebuild Settings with Preferences and Cephei framework

apps.name: BHTwitter 2.9.7 (Twitter_9.15.2_BHTwitter_2.9.7.ipa)
apps.versionDescription:
### What's new with the 2.9.7 version:
- Add new feature: Theme like Twitter blue
- Add a new feature: Hide spaces bar
- Add a new feature: Disable RTL
- Fix RTL issue with Save tweet as an image
- Fix the colour issue with Save tweet as an image
- Fix voice in DM feature
- Fix issues with the Font feature
- Fix Auto Highest Load feature

apps.name: BHTwitter 2.9.6 (Twitter_9.14_BHTwitter_2.9.6.ipa)
apps.versionDescription:
### What's new with the 2.9.6 version:
- New feature: Save tweets as images.
- Fix Padlock feature issues.
- Fix Tweet confirm option.
